009package imagingbook.common.mser.visualize;
010
011import java.util.Locale;
012
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
014
015public abstract class Mathematica {
016        
017        public static String toString(LineSegment2d ls) {
018                Pnt2d p1 = ls.getP1();
019                Pnt2d p2 = ls.getP2();
020                return String.format(Locale.US, "Line[{{%.2f,%.2f}, {%.2f,%.2f}}]", p1.getX(), p1.getY(), p2.getX(), p2.getY());
021        }
022        
023
024//      public static void main(String[] args) {
025//              LineSegment2d ls = new LineSegment2d(1,2,4,5);
026//              System.out.println(Mathematica.toString(ls));
027//              
028//      }
029}
